rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative directly modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment uses neutral language ('infections', 'wide spectrum of severity').
The segment reports on the number of infections and spectrum of severity.
The segment does not contain a loaded rhetorical question.
The segment reports a fact (spectrum of severity) without explicit calming language.
No minimiser or scale contrast found.
The segment does not contain a bare negation.
The segment reports a fact about past cases and severity spectrum, not capabilities or preparedness.
The segment reports the numerical metric 'more than two dozen human infections' using standard verbs.
